snippet.title: Game Boy Advance Longplay [340] Crazy Taxi: Catch a Ride (US)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: RickyC

It's actually pretty incredible what they managed to do with the GBA. The crazy drift I found to be a bit of a pain to pull off compared to arcade/console versions but once you have it down its fine. The extra crazy box missions are missing. I did record some of the second city but my video broke.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
